robot

Class Scanner

  • java.lang.Object
    • robot.Scanner

  • public class Scanner
extends java.lang.Object
    Scanner class which implements logic for scanning lights and obstacles Adapted from ScanRecorder.java in the skeleton
    Author:
    Corey Short, Khoa Tran, Phuoc Nguyen
